title: Add fullscreen mode to game play page

requirements.summary: Add a fullscreen toggle button to the GamePlayPage toolbar that uses the Fullscreen API to expand the game container to fill the entire browser viewport, with dynamic icon state based on fullscreen status
acceptanceCriteria: A fullscreen toggle button is visible in the GamePlayPage toolbar.
Clicking the button expands the page to fill the entire screen using the Fullscreen API.
The button icon/label updates to reflect the current fullscreen state.
Pressing Escape or clicking the button again exits fullscreen and restores the normal view.
The game canvas resizes correctly to fill the fullscreen area.

file_operations.description: Add state management for fullscreen mode using React useState. Implement toggleFullscreen function that calls document.documentElement.requestFullscreen() to enter fullscreen and document.exitFullscreen() to exit. Add a useEffect hook that listens to the 'fullscreenchange' event on the document to sync button state when the user exits fullscreen via Escape key. In the toolbar section, add a fullscreen toggle button that displays an 'Enter Fullscreen' icon (Maximize or Expand icon) when not in fullscreen mode and an 'Exit Fullscreen' icon (Minimize or Compress icon) when active. Apply conditional styling to the game container so it fills the viewport when in fullscreen mode. Ensure the game canvas dynamically adjusts its dimensions to fill the available space.

requirements.summary: Hide Header and Footer components when in fullscreen mode so only the game content occupies the full screen space
acceptanceCriteria: Header and Footer are not visible when the game is in fullscreen mode.
The game canvas occupies the full screen with no dead space.
Exiting fullscreen restores the Header and Footer to their normal positions.

file_operations.description: Add state or context to track the current fullscreen status across the app. Conditionally render the Header and Footer components in the root layout based on fullscreen state. When fullscreen is active, hide both Header and Footer so only the Outlet (game content) is visible. When fullscreen is exited, restore Header and Footer to their normal positions. Ensure the layout adjusts seamlessly without layout shifts.

Integrate with the App-level fullscreen state or context to notify the root layout when fullscreen mode is toggled. Ensure that entering fullscreen triggers the hiding of Header and Footer, and exiting fullscreen restores them. Apply full-height styling to the game container when in fullscreen to eliminate any dead space and ensure the game canvas stretches to use the entire viewport.
